experience.title: Senior Software Developer (Python)
experience.description: Was supporting legacy code and implementing new features. Stack: Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Kafka.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: Created an API for ML model. Stack: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, NumPy, Pandas, Docker. Developed an infrastructure service with microservice architecture. Involved in creation of DAGs for Airflow, tasks for Celery. Worked with PostgreSQL and Aerospike; developed producers and consumers for Kafka and manifests for Kubernetes.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: Integrated the back-end of Django-based online shop with Stripe API. Developed an algorithm for making a graph acyclic by deleting a minimal number of edges. Increased speed of classification in ML model by optimizing Python code base. Proposed additional validation of ML models and improved F-score from 80 to 92%.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: Created an application for distributed processing of 3-D models in local network (simplified analogue of FTrack). This involved designing network and database architecture, developing a GUI and client-server interaction. Stack: Python 2.7, PySide, MongoDB, XML, CSS(QSS), QWebSocket. Enhanced the security of internal data by creating a Python module for Windows (using Windows AD, win32api).

experience.title: Web-Developer
experience.description: Improved company's product by finding and fixing logical bugs. Worked with: Java, Spring, JS, EXT.js, Node.js, SOAP, SVN. Made project build on Ant.

experience.title: SWE Intern
experience.description: Created a web page for the company site using HTML, CSS and TypeScript. Involved in back-end development. Learned basics of Java Spring, Hibernate, HQL.

experience.title: Assistant in Department of Demand Planning
experience.description: Was preparing datasets for demand forecasting. Worked with visualization tools (mostly Deductor) to present forecasting results to the management.
